8 ounces ground beef,8 ounces Italian sausage,1/2 cup red onion,1/2 cup red bell pepper,1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced,1 10-ounce) can can diced tomatoes and green chiles (such as RO*TEL®),8 ounces pasteurized cheese product (such as Velveeta®), cubed,1 ( 8-ounce) package cream cheese, softened and cubed,8 ounces Pepper Jack,3/4 cup salt added canned black beans, rinsed and drained,1/2 cup frozen corn,3/4 cup diced avocado (about 1/2 avocado),1/4 cup sour cream,2 tablespoons fresh cilantro,tortilla chips for serving,,
